reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Nao is an attempt at a new buffer support. Nao’s kit functions around building up (among other things) an ATK% buff applied and stacked via her special skill.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Nao’s ATK buff has significant overlap with other buffers (e.g. Sky Layfield, Seo Yoon, Awakened Shin Jia). In a 16-man environment (CCB, Raid), Nao is able to provide a slightly better attack buff than Sky, with the trade-off being Nao is a melee-range unit. Nao periodically sees limited play in CCB, if the weekly arena buffs shore up her weaknesses:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"As Nao’s buffs are tied to ASPD, she benefits heavily from ASPD artifacts","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In order for Nao to be playable, she needs additional survivability from artifacts","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Decent assortment of buffs.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can act as an offtank with serviceable stats for a frontline supporter.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

cons.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Struggles to compete against stronger supporters who provide the same buffs and then some, with better consistency.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

baseDescription.baseDescription: Deals AoE damage to an enemy in front using a hammer. Casts Enhanced Attacks while in the [Perfect Preparation] state. Enhanced attacks resets Special Skill Buff duration.

Basic attacks grants 1 stack of [Quenching], which increases CRIT by 30 (Up to 600). Scoring CRIT Hits while in the [Quenching] state converts the state to [Perfect Preparation]. [Perfect Preparation]: Does not fall under the [Quenching] state. Reduces Special Skill CD by 4s when attacking. Removed after casting Special Skill.

level2.level2: Increases DEF by up to 20% in inverse proportion to HP.

level3.level3: Increases DEF by up to 20% in inverse proportion to HP.

level4.level4: Increases DEF by up to 40% in inverse proportion to HP.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Deals AoE damage by splitting flames in front. Continuosly grants allied Counters including self +7.5% ATK, +7.5% DEF. (Max 60%, Summons excluded). This effect decays by 7.5% every 4s until it wears off.

level5.level5: Gain 60% Melee DMG RES, 60% Ranged DMG RES when casting skill (Reduced by 10% every 3s).

baseDescription.baseDescription: Gathers energy of the flame into the hammer and grants allied Counters excluding self +60% Melee DMG RES, +60% Ranged DMG RES (Summons excluded). This effect decays by 10% every 3s until it wears off. Then drops down the hammer, dealing AoE damage. Damaged targets are stunned for 4s.

level5.level5: Gains the [Perfect Preparation] state after casting.
